001package io.github.ai4ci.functions;
002
003import org.immutables.value.Value;
004
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonDeserialize;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonSerialize;
007
008/**
009 * Gaussian kernel function.
010 *
011 * <p>
012 * This interface describes a simple Gaussian kernel function with parameters
013 * for the mean and standard deviation. It is used as a simple example of a
014 * kernel function and is not currently used in the model. Implementations are
015 * generated by Immutables (see {@link ImmutableGaussianKernel}).
016 *
017 * @author Rob Challen
018 */
019@Value.Immutable
020@JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableGaussianKernel.class)
021@JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableGaussianKernel.class)
022public interface GaussianKernel extends KernelFunction {
023
024        /**
025         * Mean of the Gaussian kernel.
026         *
027         * @return mean
028         */
029        double getMu();
030
031        /**
032         * Standard deviation of the Gaussian kernel.
033         *
034         * @return standard deviation
035         */
036        double getSigma();
037
038        /**
039         * Compute the raw value of the Gaussian kernel at a given point.
040         *
041         * <p>
042         * The raw value is computed using the formula:
043         *
044         * <pre>
045         * K(t) = exp(-((t - mu) ^ 2) / (2 * sigma ^ 2))
046         * </pre>
047         *
048         * @param t input value
049         * @return raw kernel value at t
050         */
051        @Override
052        public default double rawValue(int t) {
053                double deltat = this.getMu() - t;
054                return Math.exp(
055                                -((deltat * deltat) / (2 * this.getSigma() * this.getSigma()))
056                );
057        }
058
059}
